title: Sazanami no Shoujo-tachi
synopsis:
In a quaint port town with nostalgic charm, two 17-year-old girls forge an unusual friendship. Haruka Arima, an exemplary honor student, encounters Rin Toratani, a girl with long blonde hair, who has been skipping school. Despite their stark differences, including their problems, personalities, and lifestyles, a unique friendship blossoms. As they navigate life's challenges and confront conflicts, Haruka and Rin find the courage to confront the imperfections of the world they live in.

(Source: Animafest Zagreb)
